body: Can you provide a minimal example to reproduce the issue, thanks!

Hi,

Electron 1.6.1 is crashing while updating/modifying webview src
Related/same issue: [https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/3096](``)
How to reproduce:
install electron 1.6.1

HTML:

`  <webview class="personal" id='manager' allowpopups webpreferences='allowRunningInsecureContent' autosize minwidth="1100" minheight="790" plugins disablewebsecurity src="" ></webview>`

query used in electron 1.6.x via debugger/devtools : `$('#manager')`

Actual o/p:
`r.fn.init[1]0:webview#variationDebuggerUrl.tabs-panelength:1__proto__:Object[0]`

Expected o/p:
`<webview class="tabs-pane" id="manager" webpreferences="allowRunningInsecureContent" autosize="" minwidth="1100" minheight="790" plugins="" disablewebsecurity="" src="Url" tabindex="-1" guestinstance="4"></webview>`

If i edit my query  in debugger as:`$('#manager')[0] `I am getting above result

If i try to insert value to src attribute like below,application is crashing/closing without any warning
```
$('#manager').attr('src','www.example.com')
$('#manager')[0].attr('src','www.example.com')
```
The same syntax `$('#manager').attr('src','www.example.com')` is working fine in electron-prebuild-1.4.15

I tried with JQuery version` 1.12.4` and `3.1.1 `same issue.

Analysis : 1
Application is getting crash only if we try to replace the existing src

<webview class="tabs-pane" id="manager" webpreferences="allowRunningInsecureContent" autosize="" minwidth="1100" minheight="790" plugins="" disablewebsecurity=""[ src="Url" ](url)tabindex="-1" guestinstance="4"></webview>

If I try  `$('#manager').attr('src','www.example.com')` then it is crashing

If I create **webview without src attaibute or src="" ** like below then try to  add src attribute/value later via Jquery its not getting crashed

`<webview class="tabs-pane" id="manager" webpreferences="allowRunningInsecureContent" autosize="" minwidth="1100" minheight="790" plugins="" disablewebsecurity="" tabindex="-1" guestinstance="4"></webview>`

If I try to execute  `$('#manager').attr('src','www.example.com')` then it is working

Analysis:2

On further investigation i noted that `guestinstance`property has been attached to my webview automatically.

Possible issues:

1.if webview id ='test' src='something' and if i try to replace the src value `$('#test').attr('src','https://www.example.com')` then it is getting crashed
2.`guestinstance`property has been automatically attached to my webview class

<webview class="tabs-pane" id="manager" webpreferences="allowRunningInsecureContent" autosize="" minwidth="1100" minheight="790" plugins="" disablewebsecurity=""[ src="Url" ](url)tabindex="-1" `guestinstance="4"`></webview>

Current fix: Just set a time out while modifying webview src, tested and verified its working

```
setTimeout(function () {
    $('#csiUrl').attr('src', val);
}, 20);
```
Sorry but we are unable to fix this without a minimal reproducible case.
